full_text: Book, control, save on all things business travel with Navan. Navan is the platform where employees book their own travel. Flights, hotels and more. And see exactly what they can and can't spend based on your policy. So you don't go over budget on travel expenses again. Get real-time visibility into travel spend and find more ways to save. Speaking of ways to save, Navan rewards employees toward their personal travel when they book cheaper options. With Navan, employees self-book business trips and you stay within budget. Ready to try Navan? Get started for free at navan.com.
